definition[0]: to stop the vehicle that you are driving
example[0]: He pulled up in front of the gates.
definition[1]: to get a chair etc and sit down next to someone who is already sitting
definition[2]: to stop someone who is doing something wrong and tell them you do not approve
example[1]: I felt I had to pull her up on her lateness.
definition[3]: an exercise in which you use your arms to pull yourself up towards a bar above your head
